    • toByteArray

      public static byte[] toByteArray(String hexString)
      Helper method for converting a space delimited hex string into a byte array.
      Parameters:
      hexString - Space delimited hex string.
      Returns:
      Byte array matching the hex data inside of hexString.

    • toHexString

      public static String toHexString(byte[] data)
      Helper method for converting a byte array into a byte string.
      Parameters:
      data - The byte array that will have it's content converted into a hex string.
      Returns:
      A string containing the hex representation of the data byte array.

    • toHexString

      public static String toHexString(byte[] data, int start, int count)
      Helper method for converting a byte array into a byte string.
      Parameters:
      data - The byte array that will have it's content converted into a hex string.
      Returns:

    • gattNewStateToString

      public static final String gattNewStateToString(int newState)
      Utility method for converting Bluetooth connection states to a string.
      Parameters:
      newState - BT connection state
      Returns:
      String equivalent to the Bluetooth connection state.
      See Also:
      • BluetoothProfile.STATE_CONNECTING
      • BluetoothProfile.STATE_CONNECTED
      • BluetoothProfile.STATE_DISCONNECTED
      • BluetoothProfile.STATE_DISCONNECTING

    • gattOperationToString

      public static final String gattOperationToString(int status)
      Utility method for converting Bluetooth GATT status to a string.
      Parameters:
      status - Gatt Status
      Returns:
      Equivalent string of status

    • getV1cDelimitedData

      public static final byte[] getV1cDelimitedData(byte[] data)
      Utility method for delimiting data.This method is necessary for sending ESP data using Bluetooth SPP.
      Parameters:
      data - Byte array containing ESP data to be delimited
      Returns:
      Delimited byte data

    • calculateChecksum

      public static final byte calculateChecksum(byte[] data)
      Utility method for calculating a checksum from data
      Parameters:
      data - Source array
      Returns:
      Checksum sub calculated by summing all bytes in data

    • escapeV1cData

      public static final byte[] escapeV1cData(byte[] buffer)
      Utility method for escaping the ESP byte data in buffer. This method is necessary for sending ESP data using Bluetooth SPP.
      Parameters:
      buffer - Source array
      Returns:
      Escaped ESP data

    • isLESupported

      public static final boolean isLESupported(android.content.Context context)
      Indicates if Bluetooth LE is supported by the current devices. Returns false immediately if the Android build version is below API Level 18.
      Returns:
      Returns true of the current devices supports Bluetooth LE otherwise, false is returned.

    • isBluetoothSupported

      public static final boolean isBluetoothSupported(android.content.Context context)
      Indicates if the Bluetooth supported by the device.
      Returns:
      Returns true if Bluetooth is supported by the devices otherwise, false is returned.

    • getBluetoothAdapterCompat

      public static final android.bluetooth.BluetoothAdapter getBluetoothAdapterCompat(android.content.Context context)
      Helper method for retrieving the BluetoothAdapter for the appropriate API level version.
      Parameters:
      context - Context used to retrieve the the BluetoothAdapter on API level Build.VERSION_CODES.JELLY_BEAN_MR2 and above.
      Returns:
      Bluetooth Adapter if the device supports Bluetooth

    • nullCheck

      public static final void nullCheck(Object toCheck, String msg)
      Utility function for checking an object for nullness. If toCheck is null this function will throwing an IllegalArgumentException.
      Parameters:
      toCheck - The object to check for nullness.
      msg - The string message to be passed into IllegalArgumentException's constructor.

    • getFriendlyName

      public static String getFriendlyName(android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice device)
      Returns a user friendly name that reflects the passed in BluetoothDevice
      Parameters:
      device - Remote Bluetooth device for which you'd like the user friendly name
      Returns:
      User friendly name for device
